items.sentence: I\'ll be the one who has to tell Tom, not you.

Tom and Mary will do that when they have time.
Tom and Mary will get married sooner or later.
Tom and his brother are about the same height.

Are you guys from Austria, or is it Australia?
As expected, the price of imported goods rose.

That\'s the most beautiful sound in the world.
Tom pulled a piece of paper out of his pocket.
